entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
